snippet.title: RIKI 8Bit GAME Collection - Announcement Trailer - Nintendo Switch
snippet.description:
Feel the pulse of the past and a groove long forgotten in RIKI 8bit GAME Collection! Coming to Nintendo Switch on December 12!

Follow Clear River Games on X for updates: http://www.x.com/clearrivergames
